name: KMUHelper app on Heroku
description: Use the 'KMUHelper' with an own database.

SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key for the Django application.

EMAIL_HOST.description: The host of the email server.

EMAIL_HOST_USER.description: The user of the email server.

EMAIL_HOST_PASSWORD.description: The password of the email server.

EMAIL_PORT.description: The port of the email server.

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_USERNAME.description: The username of the superuser. (Recommended if you want to create a superuser.)

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_PASSWORD.description: The password of the superuser. (Recommended if you want to create a superuser.)

DJANGO_SUPERUSER_EMAIL.description: The email of the superuser. (Recommended if you want to create a superuser.)

DATABASE_URL.description: The database URL of an existing database, including scheme, user, password, domain, port and database. See https://github.com/jazzband/dj-database-url?tab=readme-ov-file#url-schema for more information.

scripts.postdeploy: python manage.py migrate --noinput && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py createsuperuser --noinput
